CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Electrochemical measurements for polymers P1-P6 were carried out under nitrogen on a deoxygenated solution of tetra-n-butylammonium hexafluorophosphate ( 0.1 M ) in CH 3 CN using a computer - controlled Zahner IM6e electrochemical workstation , a glassy-carbon working electrode coated with polymer films , a platinum - wire auxiliary electrode , and an Ag wire anodized with AgCl as a pseudoreference electrode. Electrochemical measurements for small molecule 4b were carried out under nitrogen on a deoxygenated solution of tetra-n-butylammonium hexafluorophosphate ( 0.1 M ) in distilled CH 2 Cl 2 using a computer - controlled Zahner IM6e electrochemical workstation , a glassy-carbon working electrode , a platinum - wire auxiliary electrode , and an Ag wire anodized with AgCl as a pseudoreference electrode. Thermogravimetric analysis ( TGA ) measurements were performed on Shimadzu thermogravimetric analyzer ( model DTG-60 ) under a nitrogen flow at a heating rate of 10 °C min -1 .

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| tetra-n-butylammonium hexafluorophosphate (0.1 M) in CH3CN |
| tetra-n-butylammonium hexafluorophosphate (0.1 M) in distilled CH2Cl2 |
| glassy-carbon working electrode |
| platinum - wire auxiliary electrode |
| Ag wire anodized with AgCl as a pseudoreference electrode |
| Shimadzu thermogravimetric analyzer (model DTG-60) |
| nitrogen |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| tetra-n-butylammonium hexafluorophosphate (0.1 M) in CH3CN |
| tetra-n-butylammonium hexafluorophosphate (0.1 M) in distilled CH2Cl2 |
| glassy-carbon working electrode |
| platinum - wire auxiliary electrode |
| Ag wire anodized with AgCl |
| Shimadzu thermogravimetric analyzer (model DTG-60) |
| nitrogen |

Note: AgCl is included as a separate material since it is mentioned as a coating on the Ag wire used as a pseudoreference electrode.

* computer-controlled (description of the electrochemical workstation)
